data.name: ReadProgramProcessingInfo1
data.value: select top(1) NAME, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, PROCESS_DATE, PARAMETER_LIST from CKT_PGM_PRCSS_INFO where (NAME = @name) and (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp)

data.name: ReadProgramProcessingInfo2
data.value: select top(1) NAME, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, PROCESS_DATE, PARAMETER_LIST from CKT_PGM_PRCSS_INFO where NAME = @name order by CREATED_TIMESTAMP desc

data.name: UpdateProgramProcessingInfo
data.value: update CKT_PGM_PRCSS_INFO set PROCESS_DATE = @processDate, PARAMETER_LIST = @parameterList where (NAME = @name) and (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp)
